TopicTitle: hello i wanted to say, best game eva!!

Articles.Content:
When I stumbled across Kerbal Space Program my jaw dropped to the floor and it went through the floorboards into my brothers room and eventually to the other side of the planet. Having recovered from the shock and amazement of learning about KSP I bought the game and was entirely launched into outer space. KSP is amazing, I had a look at the forums a bit earlier and saw some interesting competitions and the incredible stuff people have made and what they have accomplished, truly inspiring.

p.s. I hope that Obama plays this game and realises what a mistake it was to downsize the space program! exploring space takes humanity past its limits, literally and as a final note I want to retire on the moon hopefully!

peace

Amam

It\'s great you\'re enjoying the game!

But our anticipation is barley holding untill verision 16

walk out EVA\'s, cabin crew view IVA\'s.

It\'s amazing.

Well,

Have fun!

gooby pls

dolan et jur sarveece.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
